job.title: Data Scientist - Decisions
job.description: at lyft our mission is to improve peoples lives with the worlds best transportation to do this we start with our own community by creating an open inclusive and diverse organizationltbrgtltbrgtdata science is at the heart of lyfts products and decisionmaking as a member of the science team you will work in a dynamic environment where we embrace moving quickly to build the worlds best transportation data scientists take on a variety of problems ranging from shaping critical business decisions to building algorithms that power our internal and external products were looking for passionate driven data scientists to take on some of the most interesting and impactful problems in ridesharingltbrgtltbrgtyou will report to a data science managerltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtltugtresponsibilitiesltbrgtltugtltstronggtltulgtltligtleverage data to build analytic frameworks to identify opportunities for growth and efficiency ltligtltligtpartner with product managers engineers and operators to translate analytical insights into decisions and actionltligtltligtdesign and analyze experiments communicate results and act on launch decisionsltligtltligtdevelop analytical frameworks to monitor business and product performanceltligtltligtestablish metrics that measure the health of our products as well as rider and driver experienceltbrgtltligtltulgtltstronggtltugtexperienceltbrgtltugtltstronggtltulgtltligtdegree in a quantitative field such as statistics economics applied math operations research or engineering advanced degrees preferred or relevant work experienceltligtltligt years of industry experience in a data science or analytics roleltligtltligtproficiency in sql able to write structured and efficient queries on large data setsltligtltligtexperience in programming especially with data science and visualization libraries in python or rltligtltligtstrong oral and written communication skills and ability to collaborate with and influence crossfunctional partners ltbrgtltligtltulgtltstronggtltugtbenefitsltbrgtltugtltstronggtltulgtltligtgreat medical dental and vision insurance optionsltligtltligtmental health benefitsltligtltligtin addition to observed holidays salaried team members have unlimited paid time off hourly team members have days paid time offltligtltligtk plan to help save for your futureltligtltligt weeks of paid parental leave biological adoptive and foster parents are all eligibleltligtltligtpretax commuter benefitsltligtltligtlyft pink lyft team members get an exclusive opportunity to test new benefits of our ridership programltbrgtltligtltulgtltemgtlyft is an equal opportunityaffirmative action employer committed to an inclusive and diverse workplace all qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regards to race color religion sex sexual orientation gender identity national origin disability status protected veteran status or any other basis prohibited by law we also consider qualified applicants with criminal histories consistent with applicable federal state and local lawltemgt
